## Description {#details}

A container for an operand bundle being viewed as a set of values rather than a set of uses.

Unlike <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/operandbundleuse">OperandBundleUse</a>, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/operandbundledeft">OperandBundleDefT</a> owns the memory it carries, and so it is possible to create and pass around &quot;self-contained&quot; instances of <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aa97c65466bdd34abda6772dd32eb5d19">OperandBundleDef</a> and <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#af4f524db4940157ee7b5f8fac25d11f5">ConstOperandBundleDef</a>.

Definition at line 1065 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/instrtypes-h">InstrTypes.h</a>.
